alert.note: Alert for Curry County; De Baca County; East Slopes Sangre de Cristo Mountains; Eastern San Miguel County; Far Northeast Highlands; Harding County; Johnson and Bartlett Mesas Including Raton Pass; Northeast Highlands; Quay County; Roosevelt County; Union County (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: High Wind Warning issued March 31 at 3:47AM MDT until March 31 at 7:00PM MDT by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 8 AM THIS MORNING TO 7 PM MDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...West winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to 65 mph expected. * WHERE...Portions of east central, north central, and northeast New Mexico, including portions of Interstates 25 and 40. * WHEN...From 8 AM this morning to 7 PM MDT this evening. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds may blow down trees and power lines. Isolated power outages are possible. Travel could be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles on north-south oriented roads. Blowing dust may cause low visibility on area highways.
info.instruction: Take action to secure trash cans, lawn furniture, and other loose or lightweight outdoor objects. Extremely hazardous driving conditions can be expected, especially for motorists in high profile vehicles who should consider delaying travel.
